text:
Hi everyone, I’m trying to optimize the performance of a website on HubSpot but I’m having an issue with leadflows.js.
It’s quite a big script and it gets called on every page, no matter if it is needed or not.
I found this thread, which clarifies it, but wanted to check if somebody else found a workaround
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/HubSpot-Script-Loader/td-p/337463>
....sigh I just figured this out you need to use select for this not input...
